protocol_name: Protocols for "Draft genome of the Tibetan medicinal herb, Rhodiola crenulata"
protocol_name_html: Protocols for "Draft genome of the Tibetan medicinal herb, Rhodiola crenulata"
description: This is a collection of protocols that accompany the Yuanyuan Fu, et. al 2017 GigaScience publication "Draft genome of the Tibetan medicinal herb, Rhodiola crenulata".
protocol_affiliation: Institute of Chinese Medical Sciences, University of Macau, China
manuscript_citation: Fu Y, Li L, Hao S, Guan R, Fan G, Shi C, Wan H, Chen W, Zhang H, Liu G, Wang J, Ma L, You J, Ni X, Yue Z, Xu X, Sun X, Liu X, Lee SM, Draft genome sequence of the Tibetan medicinal herb . GigaScience 6(6). doi: 10.1093/gigascience/gix033

protocols.protocol_name: RNA extration for the R. crenulata genome
protocols.protocol_name_html: RNA extration for the R. crenulata genome
protocols.description: This protocol is used to clarify the process of RNA extration for our R. crenulata genome.
